name: POP'N TANKS 2
description:
This is a Sequel to a game I made in the past on a different game engine. This is made for mostly TWO PLAYERS.

Player 1 : WASD Player 2 : ARROW KEYS

Play with your friends in three different game modes Deathmatch, Control, and Assault.

In the DEATHMATCH Map the can still move after the other player is dead. Just hit The R key to restart the match.

Thank You & Enjoy!!!
